name: Jewel Party- Match 3 PVP
description:
NEW MATCH 3 PUZZLE GAME [Jewel Party]!
It's a new kind of multiplayer game. Play Online with friends OR against opponents from all over the world. [Jewel Party]is a new and exciting multiplayer PvP game!



ABUNDANT BOOSTERS IN PUZZLE MATCH GAME
Every blue jewel you match charges your Booster, while your opponent collects red jewels.
Choose one unique Booster to gain more scores, tip the game in your favor, make satisfying comebacks and score huge combos in this puzzle match PvP games!
Play with one of 20+ available characters, each with its own story and booster's effect.



PVP MULTIPLAYER MATCH 3 GAME[Jewel Party]!
In [Jewel Party], players take turns playing against each other on the same match 3 game board, so they must take into account not only the score they will get from their moves but also the opportunities it could create for their opponent! You will get one more action if special events happened. Enjoy the free match 3 puzzle game with multiplayer games here!



FRIENDS PK OR AGAINST OPPONENTS
You could share your happiness with your friends by inviting them to have a competition now! Or players will be matched against opponents with similar levels, making the game even more exciting and thrilling.



JOIN A TEAM
Join a team to meet, chat and share your game achievements with other gamers around the world. You could get extra boosters and coins in your team and build a deep friendship.



UNIQUE STICKER ALBUMS in [Jewel Party]!
Collect stickers and complete our new sticker albums to receive HUGE prizes, and unique style packs that will dazzle your opponents! If you are a big fan of collecting and also enjoy multiplayer puzzle match 3 games, come on now！



TOURNAMENTS & RANK
Play [Jewel Party], the PvP match 3 puzzle games against friends or random opponents and earn crowns to reach the top in our global/country/teams rank. Let others admire your wonderful record.

Wanna be the top match master in online match 3 games? Wanna try more extra moves? Wanna experience the glorious moment of victory? Join [Jewel Party] to show your excellent performance in puzzle match 3 games now!
